skills.title: Apostle
skills.description: Dr. Aghraghra is the founder of RISE (Rapgen International School of Excellence),nurturing value-driven, visionary leaders for the next generation of Africans.

skills.title: Life Coach
skills.description: He is keen on value re-engineering whilst empowering individuals and organizations to unlock their full potentials through strategic trainings.

skills.title: Author
skills.description: He is the author of several books, including 'Don't Take it Easy', 'Scared But Never Quitting',and 'Mastering the Discipline of Saying NO!'.

skills.title: Youth Revivalist
skills.description: As an itinerant youth revivalist and life purpose coach, he is keen on driving revolutionary change on the subject of Purposeful living
